DOC.brief_summary: The objective study establish whether Pineapple juice Viscofiber Red ginseng enhance satiety reduce appetite and/or accelerate satiation short-term .
DOC.brief_title: SATIN WP4 Acute Effect Appetite Pineapple Juice With Viscofiber Red Ginseng
DOC.detailed_description: A double-blind , randomise crossover design employ experimental ( active ) condition control condition least one week apart . After successfully complete screening procedure eligible participant invite two separate test day , least 7 day apart . On two test day , product provide randomized order part fix breakfast meal , subjective appetite rating measure every 30 min follow 8 hour . Satiety satiation measure administration test meal laboratory supply control food intake free-living condition
DOC.criteria: Participants provide write informed consent Healthy men woman Ages 18 55 year BMI 25.031.9 kg/m2 Regular breakfast eater ( eat breakfast ≥ 4 time week ) Regular menstrual period ( woman ) Significant health problem judge investigator Taking medication supplement know affect appetite body weight within past month and/or study judge investigator Pregnant , plan become pregnant within next 4 week breastfeed ( woman ) History anaphylaxis food Any know food allergy food intolerance Smoking , smoke cessation within past 3 month nicotine use ( electronic cigarette ) Selfreporting currently diet lost/gained significant amount weight ( ±3 kg ) previous 3 month Significant change physical activity pattern past 4 week intention change study judge investigator Significant change diet past 4 week intention change diet study judge investigator Use systemic local treatment likely interfere evaluation study parameter judge investigator Participants work appetite feed relate area Participants able comply study protocol Postmenopausal ( woman )
